channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Chief Justice Roberts blocks ruling that threatened Trump personnel moves
item.description: Supreme Court Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. has put a hold on a lower court ruling that had suggested judges could step in to hear cases where the...

item.title: Inside the Fortune 500 CEO pressure cooker: surviving is harder than ever and requires an ‘odd combination’ of traits
item.description: Mark Thompson is a top CEO coach and Byron Loflin is Nasdaq's in-house board whisperer. They told Fortune about joining forces for "CEO Ready."

item.title: A Washington State Senator Is Looking to Unseat One of the Quirkiest, Most Vulnerable House Dems in ’26
item.description: But knocking out the moderate-leaning rep won’t be easy.

item.title: How the Internet Broke Assimilation
item.description: Social media and messaging apps have eased the pressure to integrate.

item.description: President Trump on Saturday praised the recipients of the 2025 Kennedy Center Honors, presenting gold medallions bearing their names donated by Tiffan...

item.title: Congress faces holiday crunch as health care fix collides with shrinking calendar
item.description: Congress faces tight deadline to address spiking health care premiums before year-end, with only nine meeting days left and Jan. 15 action needed.

item.title: Trump accuses Democratic Rep. Henry Cuellar of disloyalty after post-pardon re-election announcement
item.description: President Trump on Sunday slammed Rep. Henry Cuellar's decision to seek re-election as a Democrat despite receiving a pardon last week for himself and...

item.title: The Legacy Media’s Not Dead Yet
item.description: These outlets don’t have the credibility they once did, but they still have power. Just look at the Minnesota fraud scandal.

item.title: Republicans divided over whether to salvage Obamacare — or replace it — ahead of subsidy deadline
item.description: GOP lawmakers debate whether to extend COVID-era Obamacare subsidies that could cost $30 billion annually as Republicans explore healthcare reform opt...

item.title: How Trump's drug boat strikes measure up to Obama's drone assassination missions
item.description: President Trump may be the drug boat destroyer, but he has a long way to go before he tops the drone warrior.

item.title: We All Need Almsgiving
item.description: Acts of generosity are little rebellions against isolation.

item.title: U.S. vaccine advisers end decades-long recommendation for all babies to get a hepatitis B shot at birth
item.description: Several medical societies and state health departments said they would continue to recommend them.

item.title: Following in Paul Newman and Yvon Chouinard’s footsteps: There are more ways for leaders to give it away in ‘the Great Boomer Fire Sale’ than ever
item.description: As the president and CEO of Newman's Own, which gives away 100% of its profits, I am hearing from more and more business owners who want to try.

item.title: Supreme Court to reconsider a 90-year-old unanimous ruling that limits presidential power on removing heads of independent agencies
item.description: The court's conservatives, liberal Justice Elena Kagan noted in September, seem to be “raring to take that action.”

item.title: So much of crypto is not even real—but that’s starting to change
item.description: Crypto has long felt like a giant casino with imaginary chips, but big recent breakthroughs mean it's fast becoming part of the real economy.

item.title: The U.S.-Israel Alliance Pays for Itself
item.description: From real-time intelligence to combat-tested systems, Israel provides strategic benefits that exceed the cost of U.S. aid many times over.

item.title: Normal Americans Are The Ones Who Pay The Price For Biden’s Disastrous Immigration Policies

item.title: Confirming Covid Jabs Killed Kids Reinforces Gen Z’s Distrust Of Government
item.description: American teenagers have a fractured relationship with the federal government, one that may never be healed.

item.title: Today In Republicans Being Useless: House GOPers Surrender On Obamacare Fight
item.description: By every measure, the GOP is more useless than that raccoon that broke into an ABC store, got drunk, and passed out on the bathroom floor.

item.description: In its special message, inaccurate wording disguises the USCCB’s self-interested opposition to the deportation of illegals.
